Title: Chutes and Ladders
Writer: Ryan Murphy (created by), Brad Falchuk (created by), Tim Minear, John J. Gray (executive story editor), Crystal Liu (story editor), Todd Kubrak (staff writer)
Actors: Kathy Bates, Sarah Paulson, Evan Peters, Wes Bentley
Plot: Fashion mogul Will Drake brings couture to the Hotel Cortez. A model catches the Countess' eye. John learns about the hotel's sadistic first owner.
